scripts.lint: npm -w web run lint && npm -w api run lint
scripts.typecheck: npm -w web run typecheck && npm -w api run typecheck
scripts.build: npm -w web run build && npm -w api run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c cyan,magenta "npm -w api run start:dev" "npm -w web run dev"
scripts.perf:k6:comments: docker run --rm -i -e BASE_URL=${BASE_URL:-http://host.docker.internal:4000} -e VUS=${VUS:-50} -e DURATION=${DURATION:-1m} grafana/k6 run - < tests/load/k6/comments.js
scripts.perf:k6:search: docker run --rm -i -e BASE_URL=${BASE_URL:-http://host.docker.internal:4000} -e VUS=${VUS:-60} -e DURATION=${DURATION:-1m} grafana/k6 run - < tests/load/k6/search.js
